title: The Deal's Off in Justice Department Win
itunes:title: The Deal's Off in Justice Department Win
description:
Antitrust law expert Harry First, a professor at NYU Law School, discusses a judge blocking Penguin Random House’s $2.18 billion acquisition of rival book publisher Simon & Schuster.
Bloomberg Politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, a professor of political science at Iona College, discusses issues in the upcoming election.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
